response.overview: While musing on how they would prefer to die, six aging friends hatch Operation Bon Voyage au Chocolate: When life is no longer worth living, they'll sail off into the sunset while they eat enough chocolate to literally kill them. The pals periodically reunite on a boat off the North Carolina coast to share their joys, doubts and struggles -- and to determine if the time is ripe to set their plan in motion. Bud Dowdey directs this dark indie comedy.
response.title: Death, Taxes...and Chocolate!
